Hitliubo,

The type column shows:
- The string you enter in your assertXXX(=
) call.
- Stack trace of Exceptions that are thrown during testing.

Each J=
Unit assertXXX() method allows you to pass a text message as 
first paramet=
er.
This message will appear in the type column, if your assert fails.

I d=
on't think there is a standard option to write other text to that 
column.
=
You would have to write your own JUnitReport stylesheet to achieve 
this.

=
Regards, Jan
